T=int(input())
    
for _ in range(0,T):
    n=int(input())
    nums=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    nums.sort()
    freq=[0 for x in range(10001)]
    
    maxm=nums[0]
    for i in range(0,n):
        freq[nums[i]]+=1
        if(freq[nums[i]]>freq[maxm]):
            maxm=nums[i]
        
    print maxm,max(freq)
